title: On a generalisation sum involving the Euler function
abstract:
Let $j \ge1$, $k\ge 0$ be real numbers and $\varphi(n)$ be the Euler
function. In this paper, we study the asymptotical behaviour of the summation
function $$S_{j,k}(x):=\sum_{n\le x}\frac{\varphi\left ( \left [ \frac{x}{n}
\right ]^{j} \right ) }{\left [ \frac{x}{n} \right ]^{k} } $$ as $x\to \infty
$, where $\left [ \cdot \right ] $ is the integral part function. Our results
combine and generalize the recent work of Zhai, Wu and Ma.
